monitorEnable.description: Enable flag for scene monitor for DCIAF. Effect: Runs distance estimation library in continuous mode for scene monitor.

monitorFrequency.description: Max rate of distance estimation in monitor mode. Effect: Distance stats would arrive at or below this rate in monitor.

searchFrequency.description: Max rate of distance estimation in AF search mode. Effect: Distance stats would arrive at or below this rate in search.

baselineMM.description: Physical distance(mm) between optical centers of dual cameras.

macroEstimateLimitCM.description: Closest distance in cm estimated by depth service. Effect: Distance may not be estimated for objects closer than this value.

alignmentCheckEnable.description: Enable alignment check in depth service. Effect: Enables alignment check.

jumpToStartLimit.description: Largest lens position jump. Effect: Smaller steps would give smooth lens move. Larger steps would move lens to destination in one step.

numNearSteps.description: Number of steps at near end. Effect: Affects near range of fine search.

numFarSteps.description: Number of steps at far end. Effect: Affects far range of fine search.

dciafStepSize.description: Step size to determine range of fine search. Effect: Affects range of fine search.

motionDataUseEnable.description: Flag for using gyro data for trigger. Effect: Uses gyro info for scene change and panning stable.

sceneChangeLensPositionThreshold.description: Lens position delta threshold for scene change detection.

panningStableLensPositionThreshold.description: Lens position delta threshold for scene stable.

panningStableDurationMSBright.description: Time duration to consider scene stable in bright light in ms. Effect: Trigger speed and behavior in bright light.

panningStableDurationMSLow.description: Time duration to consider scene stable in low light in ms. Effect: Trigger speed and behavior in low light.

maxLowLightWaitMs.description: Time duration Focus Converge Time out in ms in Low Light Effect: Can cause to time out faster if DCRF is not working.

maxNormalLightWaitMs.description: Time duration Focus Converge Time out in ms in Low Light Effect: Can cause to time out faster if DCRF is not working.

jumpWithNoSkip.description: If Last Jump before fine search exceeds this threshold, skip a frame Effect: If disabled, can cause focus failures when moving between infinity and macro.

skipframesBeforeFineSearch.description: No of Frames to skip before fine search if a big jump is detected, Effect: If disabled, can cause focus failures when moving between infinity and macro.

distanceThresholdMacroRegionInMM.description: Used to compute dynamic scene change threshold for macro region.

distanceThresholdNonMacroFactor.description: Used to compute dynamic scene change threshold for macro region.

lowLightThreshold.description: Maps to the Lux index to understand whats the threshold for low light. Effect: Trigger speed and behavior in low light.

useFineSearchExtension.description: Enables fine search extension. Effect: WIll account for DCRF failures if any.

macroRegionThresholdInMM.description: Use the threshold to determine if its in macro region. Effect: Allows to use correct setp size and no of steps per region.

farRegionThresholdInMM.description: Use the threshold to determine if its in macro region. Effect: Allows to use correct setp size and no of steps per region.
